title: Ukraine peace talks remain distant even as Russia orders a retreat.
dc:creator: Michael Crowley, Edward Wong and Julian E. Barnes

media:content.media:credit: Finbarr O'Reilly for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Ukrainian soldiers ride atop an armored vehicle. President Biden and European leaders are hard-pressed to describe a plausible endgame to the conflict that would be acceptable to both sides.
